summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 9A Body wave bundles with closure Brazilian human hair 4 bundles with lace closure Unprocessed Brazilian body wave virgin hair bundles with closure 4X4 Lace Middle Part (22 24 26 28+20) Review Date: 2019/05/04 Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '12 x 6.1 x 2.2 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'UPC': '699747934107'} Review Text: I paid $189.99 for this hair that I had to take off 1 week after install. It's PURE GARBAGE. NOT human hair, NOT 9A grade. My hair burned when I tried to flat iron it at 250 degrees!. Tangled like crazy and shedded like a cat. I contacted the seller to tell them this hair was no good and they offered me a 30% refund IF I give them a GOOD (LYING) REVIEW. What a joke. Any other amazon seller would apologize for the inconvenience and offer you a replacement or refund to keep you happy. $189.99 dollars I will never see again. What a disappointment, trowed the whole bundles in the garbage and was forced to buy a wig.

DO NOT, I repeat DO NOT waste your money on this. Look for another amazon vendor and READ all 1 star reviews, those are the ones that really tell you how it is. Review Title: HAIR IS GARBAGE DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Natural Waterproof Mascara Extra Long Lash,Thick Thickening and Lengthening, No Clumping, No Smudging, Lasting Voluminous Eyelashes Dramatic Extension Mascara Review Date: 2020/07/27 Store: SIKEMAY Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Color': 'Black', 'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676852', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'} Review Text: This Mascara is so esthetically pleasing :) so beautiful packaging and big. I can’t get over how full they make my eyelashes look! Order it now! Review Title: Esthetically Pleasing !!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers Review Date: 2020/12/09 Store: LOLYSENTA Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.1 x 1.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LS17', 'UPC': '850002524062', 'Manufacturer': 'LOLYSENTA, LLC'} Review Text: This is the new fashion trend and I am happy
I got on board work it lol. The rose quartz feels cold to the touch of your skin proving the skin with a fresh clean feeling after applying your moisturizer. The spike roller is for after washing your face. Very nice combo on selling both of them together. Review Title: Both very beautiful Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyelashes 3D Mink Lashes 3D Milk EyeLashes 17mm to 20mm False Eyelashes 100% Real Siberian Natural Eyelashes Luxury Reusable Handmade Fake Eyelashes 4 Pairs Review Date: 2020/12/28 Store: Smaty Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Smaty', 'Material': '3d,Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 4.2 x 0.7 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '739515450870'} Review Text: These lashes are beautiful. I would recommend these to all my girls. Review Title: Nice volume Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 6 in 1 Curling Irons, Hair Curling Wand Set with Hair Straightener Brush, Hair Curler Wands with 0.3-1 Inch Interchangeable Barrels Instant Heat Up Hair Curling Iron with LCD Display & Temp Adjustment Review Date: 2021/07/13 Store: GYCHEE Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'GYCHEE', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Max Temperature Setting': '232.2 Degrees Celsius', 'Heater Surface Material': 'Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '15.75 x 13.11 x 2.09 inches; 2.51 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'ZXQ-VL0214A', 'Manufacturer': 'GYCHEE'} Review Text: It heats up very hot but it has all the right tools to make beautiful curls. I really like. Only have used 2 curlers so far and I am stuck with them because I like the way it looks! Highly recommended. Review Title: This set is amazing Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: STARAMZ 7 Packs Big Bridesmaid Scrunchies Oversize Elastic Hair Ties Large Scrunchies Ponytail Hair Accessories Scrunchy for Girls Women (Blush) Review Date: 2021/07/13 Store: STARAMZ Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Material': 'Satin', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'STARAMZ', 'Number of Pieces': '7', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.13 x 7.72 x 2.48 inches; 5.93 Ounces'} Review Text: These scrunchies are HUGE and adorable. I didn't expect them to be so big. They are great I like them a lot. Great to give as a gift too. Review Title: LOVE THEM Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Yolife Acrylic Nail Brush with100% Pure Kolinsky Sable, Nail Art Brush With Brilliant crystal Handle, for Manicure Pedicure (6#, Silver) Review Date: 2021/08/02 Store: YOLIFE Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Color': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'YOLIFE', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.75 x 2 x 0.3 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Review Text: Perfect for my business, this is a must have tool to apply ringstones. Review Title: Just get it Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: HICOCU 25mm 3D Mink Lashes Full Volume Mink Eyelashes Fluffy Volume Dramatic 25mm Mink Lashes Extension Cruelty-free Siberian Mink Strip Eyelashes …… (Y715) Review Date: 2021/08/02 Store: HICOCU Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'HICOCU', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 6.5 x 0.67 inches; 1.27 Ounces'} Review Text: Great eyelashes, look super full, give you the most dramatic look I love them. Review Title: Great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Galashy Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit - 5 Pairs Reusable False Lashes, 2 Bottles Magnetic Liner, Tweezer Applicator Tool Review Date: 2021/08/02 Store: GALASHY Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'GALASHY', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '5.71 x 5.35 x 0.75 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '860004689263'} Review Text: Great eyelashes, look super full, give you the most dramatic look I love them. Review Title: Still have some left Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Nail File and Buffers,TsMADDTs 14 Pack Professional Manicure Tools Set with 6PCS 100/180 Grit Nail Files Double Sided Emery Board 6PCS Nail Buffer Block 120 Grit Nail Scrubbing Brush Cuticle Knife Review Date: 2021/08/04 Store: TsMADDTs Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.96 x 5.39 x 1.02 inches; 3.77 Ounces', 'UPC': '616010018579', 'Manufacturer': 'TsMADDTs'} Review Text: This is great for mani and pedis, you get all you need here. Love all the filers. Review Title: Great for Nail Artists Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
This individual exhibits a clear preference for beauty and personal care products, with significant interest in cosmetics, hair care, and nail maintenance. They consistently rate products based on quality and performance, favoring items that enhance aesthetic appeal and functionality.

Key patterns reveal a high expectation for product quality, as seen in their harsh critique of a subpar hair bundle purchase contrasted with their praise for effective beauty tools like mascara and curling irons. This suggests a sensitivity to product failure, particularly in hair-related items, while they appreciate well-performing cosmetics and tools. 

The user demonstrates a willingness to invest in higher-quality products, especially those that offer aesthetically pleasing designs and effective results. Price sensitivity appears to be moderate; however, past experiences seem to steer them away from items that promise high value yet deliver poor results.

In summary, their core preferences lean towards reliable, effective beauty products that enhance personal aesthetics, with a strong emphasis on quality and functionality over mere appearance.

target_interaction.title: Very nice
target_interaction.text: Love this headbands. So stylish and cute, they are so IN right now and add such a nice touch to your hair and complete your outfit. Not uncomfortable on the ears either.
target_interaction.title_meta: Headbands for Woman Pearls Headbands,Logiverl 2PCS Pearls Headband Elegant Hair Clip Hairpins Headwear Barrette Styling Tools Accessories for Christmas Gift
